column2: BrightView Holdings, Inc. is an investment company, which engages in the provision of commercial landscaping services. The company is headquartered in Blue Bell, Pennsylvania and currently employs 20,900 full-time employees. The firm provides commercial landscaping services, ranging from landscape maintenance and enhancements to tree care and landscape development. The company operates through an integrated national service prototype, which systematically delivers services at the local levels. The firm is a single-source end-to-end landscaping solution provider to diverse customer base at the national, regional and local levels. The company operates through two segments: Maintenance Services and Development Services.
